mapper.select: select shuffle_id from shuffle where account_id = #{accountId} and template_id = #{templateId};
mapper.insert: insert into shuffle(account_id, template_id, numbers, choices) values (#{accountId}, #{templateId}, #{numbers}, #{choices});
mapper.delete: delete from shuffle where template_id = #{templateId} and exists( select * from answer where submitter is not null and submitter = shuffle.account_id and template_id = shuffle.template_id )
delete from shuffle where account_id is not null and account_id = #{accountId} and template_id = #{templateId};
